fields.value: Replication data for: Choice or circumstance? Adjusting measures of foreign policy similarity for chance agreement.

dsDescriptionValue.value: The Stata files contained in this replication archive allow the reproduction of all results presented in the article and the supplementing information. In addition, the archive provides a variety of dyadic similarity measures for all COW state system members over an extended period of time. The measures based on alliance relationships are available from 1816 to 2000, and the measures based on UN voting records from 1946 to 2004. See www.frankhaege.eu for easier access to specific similarity measure files and updates of those datasets.

keywordValue.value: similarity, measurement, preferences, international conflict, foreign policy

publicationCitation.value: Frank M. Häge. 2011. "Choice or circumstance? Adjusting measures of foreign policy similarity for chance agreement." Political Analysis, In Press. article available here

files.description: This zip-file contains all Stata files used to produce the similarity measures and study results reported in the article and the supplementary information. Note that the size of the zip-file is about 500MB; the size of the uncompressed files is about 2.3GB.
files.label: FMHaege 2011 Replication Archive for Choice or Circumstance 110504.zip
